name: w1z
description:
This was my final project in highschool. It's a game about a wizard fighting his way through a tower to reach the very top and defeat the evil Witch. It's made in 100% pure JavaScript and it's pretty garbage.  Also it's my very first game!

The goal is to clear all rooms on each floor before you can use the "up arrow block" in the middle room to progress. The map shows you which rooms you have cleared until now to make progress quicker. The middle room also includes a shop where you can spend your gold and upgrade your character.

All art  © me, all code © me

Enjoy!
